XuTri.label0: No signs of phlebitis. OBSERVE CANNULA
XuTri.label1: Possibly first signs of phlebitis. OBSERVE CANNULA
XuTri.label2: Early stage of phlebitis. RESITE CANNULA
XuTri.label3: Medium stage of phlebitis. RESITE CANNULA. CONSIDER TREATMENT
XuTri.label4: Advanced stage of phlebitis or the start of thrombophlebitis. RESITE CANNULA. CONSIDER TREATMENT
XuTri.label5: Advanced stage thrombophlebitis. INITIATE TREATMENT. RESITE CANNULA

TRƯỜNG HỢP NGƯỜI BỆNH/NGƯỜI GIÁM HỘ KÝ X: WITH CONFIRMATION SIGNATURE OF PATIENT/PATIENT'S FAMILY MEMBER
Tôi là người bệnh/người giám hộ, trong t: This is to certify that I, as a patient/patient's family, am refusing at my own insistence and without the authority of and against the advice of my doctor(s), request to leave against medical advice. The medical risks/benefits have been explained to me by a member of the medical staff and I understand those risks.
Tôi xin được ra viện/xin cho người nhà t: I hereby release the hospital, its administration, personnel, and my doctor(s) from any responsibility for all consequences, which may result by my leaving under these circumstances.
Tôi xác nhận đã giải thích cho người bện: I confirm my clear explanation to patient/ patient's family member about the current medical conditions, treatment's purpose and potential negative consequence from discharge AMA.
Tôi xác nhận rằng người bệnh/người giám: I confirm that the patient/ patient's family is mentally healthy, sufficiently competent to make the decision to leave AMA.

(1) Ưu tiên dùng Heparine không phân đoạ: (1) Prioritize using low dose unfractionated heparin for renal failure cases with creatinine clearance (CrCl) <30ml/min. Thrombocytes monitoring: orders a platelet count test after the first 4 days of treatment. After that, orders tests every 2 days until the patient is no longer receiving heparin.
(2) Không sử dụng enoxaparine khi mức lọ: (2) Do not use enoxaparin when CrCl < 30ml/min. Thrombocytes monitoring: during medication, a platelet count test is not necessary; unless patient is going under an open heart surgery, then order a platelet count test at day 4th.
(3) Tất áp lực giảm dần từ dưới lên trên: (3) Graduated compression stockings: pressure gradually decrease from beneath: ankle = 18 mmHg; middle of calf = 14 mmHg, thigh = 8 mmHg. Contraindicated if patient has conditions of: lower extremity arterial disease, diabetic neuropathy, has or in risks of skin ulcer/necrosis.
(4) Thiết bị bơm hơi ngắt quãng: Chống c: (4) Intermittent Pneumatic Compressor (IPC):contraindicated if patient has conditions of: lower extremity arterial disease, diabetic neuropathy, in risks of skin ulcer/necrosis. Do not apply device on patients having been immobilized for more than 72 hours or detective DVT.
Ưu tiên Heparin cho bệnh nhân suy thận c: Prioritize using low dose unfractionated heparin for renal failure cases with creatinine clearance (CrCl) <30ml/min
xét nghiệm tiểu cầu lần đầu sau 4 ngày đ: orders a platelet count test after the first 4 days of treatment. Ạfter that, orders tests every 2 days until the patient is no longer receiving heparin

In mentally healthy condition, I hereby state that I am making an informed decision and agree to the donot- resuscitate order when the condition required.
